data.name: Abu Ja'far

data.name: Aegis of Honor

data.name: Ajani's Presence

Strive — This spell costs {2}{W} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Any number of target creatures each get +1/+1 and gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

data.name: Ajani's Welcome

data.flavor_text: "You cannot defend others if your own well-being is neglected."

data.flavor_text: Bant's armies are primarily composed of members of the Mortar caste, loyal commoners who haven't yet earned a sigil.

data.name: Akroan Jailer
data.oracle_text: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
data.flavor_text: He ensures escape attempts are just that—attempts.

data.name: Alabaster Leech
data.oracle_text: White spells you cast cost {W} more to cast.
data.flavor_text: "Its stones seem to serve a healing function, but removing them intact is an exhausting process." —Tolarian research notes

data.name: Alaborn Zealot

Choose one —
• Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
• Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: "Sure, you know the law. But I know the streets."

data.name: Alliance of Arms

data.name: Angel's Grace

Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
You can't lose the game this turn and your opponents can't win the game this turn. Until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

data.name: Angel's Herald

data.flavor_text: Rigorous faith and belief are rewarded on occasion, and richly so.

data.oracle_text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

{W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

data.oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target artifact.

Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

data.name: Aven Skirmisher

Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

data.name: Benalish Hero

If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

data.name: Elvish Hexhunter
data.oracle_text: {G/W}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Hexhunter: Destroy target enchantment.
data.flavor_text: "All manner of curses, blights, and luckspoils infect Shadowmoor. We stalk them, one perilous quest at a time."

data.name: Emerge Unscathed
data.oracle_text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

data.name: Empty City Ruse
data.oracle_text: Target opponent skips all combat phases of their next turn.
data.flavor_text: Out of time and options, Kongming was forced to bluff at Xicheng. He tricked an army of 150,000 Wei by leaving the city gates open and calmly playing the zither.

data.name: Empty-Shrine Kannushi
data.oracle_text: Empty-Shrine Kannushi has protection from the colors of permanents you control.
data.flavor_text: "Crease the folds, bend the paper, turn the spirits, shield the soul."

data.name: Encampment Keeper
data.oracle_text:
First strike
{7}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Encampment Keeper: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Paladins of the Sanctum Seeker order are an adventurous lot, venturing into the wilds with monstrous mastiffs at their side.

data.name: Enlightened Tutor
data.oracle_text: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
data.flavor_text: "Organization is often undervalued but rarely unjustified." —Frasio, royal archivist

data.name: Enshrouding Mist
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. If it's renowned, untap it.
data.flavor_text: True faith is letting the blade fall without parry. True cunning is using that moment to strike a deadly blow.

data.name: Ephara's Radiance
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{1}{W}, {T}: You gain 3 life."
data.flavor_text: "Civilization is the sum of Ephara's gifts." —Olexa of the Twelve

data.name: Equinox
data.oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Counter target spell if it would destroy a land you control."

data.name: Erase
data.oracle_text: Exile target enchantment.
data.flavor_text: "Truth is hard enough to see, let alone understand. We must remove all distractions to find clarity." —Zogye, wandering sage

data.name: Ethereal Armor
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.
data.flavor_text: Metal is scarce, smiths are pricey, and plate mail is heavy.

data.name: Ethereal Haze
data.oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn.
data.flavor_text: "Imagine a dove flying through smoke. Does the dove injure the smoke? Does the smoke impede the dove?" —Teachings of Eight-and-a-Half-Tails

data.name: Excise
data.oracle_text: Exile target attacking creature unless its controller pays {X}.
data.flavor_text: "Creation is no great feat. Anything you make, I can unmake in a heartbeat." —Alexi, zephyr mage

data.name: Expedition Envoy
data.flavor_text: The unofficial motto of every expedition house is "ready for anything," a phrase whose significance has been amplified since the emergence of the Eldrazi.

data.name: Faith's Shield
data.oracle_text:
Target permanent you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, instead you and each permanent you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

data.name: False Peace
data.oracle_text: Target player skips all combat phases of their next turn.
data.flavor_text: Mutual consent is not required for war.

data.name: Fan Bearer
data.oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Tap target creature.
data.flavor_text: Rest sometimes requires the right prompting.

data.name: Fasting
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a hunger counter on Fasting. Then destroy Fasting if it has five or more hunger counters on it.
If you would begin your draw step, you may skip that step instead. If you do, you gain 2 life.
When you draw a card, destroy Fasting.

data.name: Favored Hoplite
data.oracle_text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Favored Hoplite, put a +1/+1 counter on Favored Hoplite and prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn.

data.name: Festival
data.oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during an opponent's upkeep.
Creatures can't attack this turn.
data.flavor_text: Only after the townsfolk had drawn us into their merry celebration did we discover that their holiday rituals held a deeper purpose.

data.name: Festival of the Guildpact
data.oracle_text:
Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Everyone knows that violence at the Festival brings the worst of luck, so for at least one day a year arms are laid down in favor of brimming goblets.

data.name: Festival of Trokin
data.oracle_text: You gain 2 life for each creature you control.
data.flavor_text: Everyone loves a good sale.

data.name: Figure of Destiny
data.oracle_text:
{R/W}: Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4.
{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}{R/W}: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.

data.name: Firehoof Cavalry
data.oracle_text: {3}{R}: Firehoof Cavalry gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "What warrior worth the name fears to leave a trail? If my enemies seek me, let them follow the ashes in my wake."

data.name: Flickering Ward
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As Flickering Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Flickering Ward.
{W}: Return Flickering Ward to its owner's hand.

data.name: Foothill Guide
data.oracle_text:
Protection from Goblins
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
data.flavor_text: "Like any pests, goblins must be repelled quickly or they multiply."

data.name: Fragmentize
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment with converted mana cost 4 or less.
data.flavor_text: "Too much friction on your bearings, your countersinking is inconsistent, and there are lines in your casting. Dispose of it, and begin again." —Dovin Baan

data.name: Frontline Strategist
data.oracle_text:
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Frontline Strategist is turned face up, prevent all combat damage non-Soldier creatures would deal this turn.

data.name: Funeral Pyre
data.oracle_text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Its owner creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: "Raze the body. Raise the soul." —Mystic elder

data.name: Fylgja
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Fylgja enters the battlefield with four healing counters on it.
Remove a healing counter from Fylgja: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature this turn.
{2}{W}: Put a healing counter on Fylgja.

data.name: Gaze of Justice
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap three untapped white creatures you control.
Exile target creature.
Flashback {5}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost and any additional costs. Then exile it.)

data.name: Gelid Shackles
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
{S}: Enchanted creature gains defender until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

data.name: Genju of the Fields
data.oracle_text:
Enchant Plains
{2}: Until end of turn, enchanted Plains becomes a 2/5 white Spirit creature with "Whenever this creature deals damage, its controller gains that much life." It's still a land.
When enchanted Plains is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Fields from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Gerrard's Battle Cry
data.oracle_text: {2}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

data.name: Get a Life
data.oracle_text: Target player and each of that player's teammates exchange life totals.
data.flavor_text: Gimme five! (Or whatever you got.)

data.name: Ghost-Lit Redeemer
data.oracle_text:
{W}, {T}: You gain 2 life.
Channel — {1}{W}, Discard Ghost-Lit Redeemer: You gain 4 life.

data.name: Gideon's Defeat
data.oracle_text: Exile target white creature that's attacking or blocking. If it was a Gideon planeswalker, you gain 5 life.
data.flavor_text: "Gideon, how easy it must be to play the protector when you think yourself untouchable. How wrong you are." —Nicol Bolas

data.name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
data.oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
data.flavor_text: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

data.name: Gift of Granite
data.oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
data.flavor_text: The blessing adds both protection to the recipient and weightlessness to the stone.

data.name: Gimme Five
data.oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each person who high-fives you in the next thirty seconds. Each player in a silver-bordered game who high-fives you gains 1 life. (Offer high fives. Don't hit people.)
data.flavor_text: "Up high! To the side! Down low! To the left! Other left! Over here—"

data.name: Gird for Battle
data.oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
data.flavor_text:
"You won't need the sword drills, your shields, or my blessing. You'll fight for Sunhome with the truth in your heart."
—Aurelia

data.name: Glaring Aegis
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Glaring Aegis enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

data.name: Glimpse the Sun God
data.oracle_text: Tap X target creatures. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text: Better to be beneath Heliod's notice than beneath his heel.

data.name: Glint Hawk
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Glint Hawk enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Its eyes burned nearly blind by the Whitesun, it hunts by metallic gleam.

data.name: Glittering Lynx
data.oracle_text:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx.
{2}: Until end of turn, Glittering Lynx loses "Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Glittering Lynx." Any player may activate this ability.

data.name: Glyph of Life
data.oracle_text: Choose target Wall creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage by an attacking creature this turn, you gain that much life.
data.flavor_text: Any wall can be battered down, but at what cost?

data.name: God-Pharaoh's Faithful
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a blue, black, or red spell, you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text: "This is the final trial! Rejoice, for the God-Pharaoh soars among us!"

data.name: Gods Willing
data.oracle_text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

data.name: Goldenglow Moth
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text: "Little moth, fluttering bright, What luck will you bring tonight?" —Benalish children's rhyme

data.name: Goldmeadow Dodger
data.oracle_text: Goldmeadow Dodger can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: "I've gotten close enough to a giant to smell his breath, but none has ever so much as spotted me. I wonder how long my record can extend?"

data.name: Goldmeadow Harrier
data.oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
data.flavor_text: "It's a proven fact that sling-stones from the dawn side of the riverbank sail the farthest and truest." —Deagan, cenn of Burrenton

data.name: Goldmeadow Stalwart
data.oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a Kithkin card from your hand or pay {3}.
data.flavor_text: The thoughtweft ties a clachan together. Sharing each other's hopes and fears, all the village's citizens spring into action upon the first threat to any one of them.

data.name: GO TO JAIL
data.oracle_text:
When GO TO JAIL enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until GO TO JAIL leaves the battlefield.
At the beginning of the upkeep of the exiled card's owner, that player rolls two six-sided dice. If they roll doubles, sacrifice GO TO JAIL.

data.name: Great Defender
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its converted mana cost.

data.name: Green Scarab
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by green creatures.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a green permanent.

data.name: Green Ward
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from green. This effect doesn't remove Green Ward.

data.name: Gryff's Boon
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying.
{3}{W}: Return Gryff's Boon from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

data.name: Guard Duty
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender.
data.flavor_text: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

data.name: Guardian Angel
data.oracle_text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Until end of turn, you may pay {1} any time you could cast an instant. If you do, prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to that permanent or player this turn.

data.name: Guildscorn Ward
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from multicolored.
data.flavor_text: "The Gateless have risen. The Ten shall fall." —Ninth District graffiti

data.name: Guilty Conscience
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, Guilty Conscience deals that much damage to that creature.
data.flavor_text: Those who most feel guilt don't need to, while those who most need to feel guilt never do. —Order proverb
